problem.p: Where along the height of the cross-section of a cantilever beam with a point load at the end will the tensile stress be greatest?

choicegroup.label: Where along the height of the cross-section of cantilever beam with a point load at the end will the tensile stress be greatest?
choicegroup.choice: at the top of the cross-section - Point A
at the midpoint of the cross-section - Point B
at the bottom of the cross-section - Point C
